entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
